thread.title: Fast Fashion Comes to the Beauty Aisle

author: Jaewon Kang
title: Fast Fashion Comes to the Beauty Aisle
text:
A beauty startup is vexing established cosmetics companies by mimicking the popular brands and quickly rolling out less expensive versions of their eye shadows, lipsticks and other makeup.
Makeup Revolution has been winning shelf space at Ulta Beauty Inc. and plans to grow its revenue by 50% in 2018. Itâ€™s the type of company wooing customers from struggling mass-market brands such as CoverGirl and Revlon.
